Subject: Laboratory management functions

Functions like asset and instrument management help monitor usage, maintenance, and training requirements, while sample inventory and tracking improve organization and prevent loss of valuable biological or chemical materials. Additionally, chemical databases provide automated identification and safety data for risk assessment, and ordering functions streamline procurement processes. By incorporating these capabilities, ERNs enhance efficiency, reduce administrative burden, and support a more transparent and well-coordinated laboratory workflow.
